title: Like-New 3 story town home! Private rooftop
posting_body: ['Like-New 3 story town home!', 'Private rooftop', 'Property Address', '1223 N EDGEMONT ST - 01 | Los Angeles, CA 90029', 'Available: Now', 'Offered By', 'Adaptive Realty Inc.', '|', 'show contact info', 'Description', 'Showing now!', 'Contact Wali to schedule:', 'wali @', 'adaptiverealty .', 'com', 'show contact info', '(text for quick response)', 'Be the second to live in this like-new 1 Bedroom, 1.5 Bath with a Townhouse Style Layout with your very own roof deck!', 'Unit Features:', '-3-Level Townhouse Layout', '-Private Roof Deck', '-Stainless steel appliances', '-Washer/Dryer in-unit', '-Quartz Counters', '-Central A/C and Heat with Smart Thermostats', '-Bike Racks in garage', '-One assigned parking space', '-Pets OK (2 pet max / must be approved by mgmt)', 'CHECK OUT THE 3D VIRTUAL TOUR (copy/paste): <URL>', '**', 'v i r t u a l**t o u r** available at www dot adaptiverealty dot com', 'Neighborhood:', 'In the heart of East Hollywood,  just on the edge of Los Feliz & Silver Lake!', 'The Metro Red Line is a 5 min walk, and easy access to the 101.', 'Only a few feet around the corner on Fountain- get coffee at Mestizo, brunch at Square One Dining, or supplies at Besties Vegan.', 'Less than a 10min walk to LACC or Barnsdall Park.', 'About Us:', 'Adaptive Realty is a progressive management company based in Los Angeles.', 'We specialize in sensitive renovations of historic buildings located in Echo Park, Silver Lake, Highland Park, and Lincoln Heights.', 'Renters love our apartments, but, sadly, scammers do, too.', "Don't be fooled: Real Adaptive personnel use <URL> email addresses 100% of the time.", 'PLEASE NOTE:', 'Photos may not be of the exact unit advertised.', '#AdaptiveRealty', 'Amenities', 'common area', 'brand new', 'Views', 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.5BA', 'Square Feet: 1,048', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $2,900.00', 'Available: Now', 'Application Fee: $25.00', 'Security Deposit: $2,900.00', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
